body: i swear this is just retarded
This author as a problem with writing both NTr and vanilla dude mixes both up and it becomes unreadable

No I haven't forgotten what VANILLA is but I'm pretty sure some of you have. It's call foundation and guess what all NTR needs it to make sense all else it's just shit. How can you call this an NTR let alone a VANILLA ending when there's no foundation of love and care between the characters, you know for the shock value that NTR needs deliver might as well call this cheating.

tbh yeah vanilla ending from ntr is just BS,
its NTR, the end will be the girl choose other dude rather than the mc/her lover,
the end will be some dude steal mc girl.

this is not ntr to vanilla end, this is rape to vanilla end.
jesus i need more salmon.
@Ecchinosuke I think you might have forgotten what vanilla mean. It's is possible to have a vanilla outcome from a NTR
@metroid tell me do you even know what the term VANILLA means in hentai?

@Metroid a vanilla ending for a NTR should actually be possible. 9 times out of them the woman is getting NTRed against her will or is being mind controlled, a good MC should be able to break the situation and save her, possibly by also going fist of the north star on their asses.

Another possibility is for the couple to have an open relationship, this would however imply japanese hentai writers know how to write casual sex initiated by the woman without turning her into a huge whore (Like, there's no inbetween with them, it's just weird).

There was a NTR manga I read ages ago about the girl getting divine powers after they shoot the MC and killing the NTR dudes by unleashing an earthquake and then healing him, and it didn't even come out of nowhere thing was forshadowed since chapter 1 and was a major plot point on why she was getting NTRed against her will.

Peace Hame also has an happy ending despite the NTR Chapter.

Wow this ending was SHIT. How the fuck does this story go from NTR to a VANILLA happy ending like this. Husband finds out she's been cheating on him not just with the brother and father, but with any other guy as well and he still wants to give it a shot again. Ether the husband is suffering from a huge case of denial or the author just doesn't know how human beings act. Or is just how Japanese are I don't know.
It took only 3 years to complete the translation. Leaving that aside the ending is truly bullshit which is expected when you try to make  a "happy ending" in an ntr hentai
